system.special: SM Wep, Power Field, Tearing, Unbalanced, Volatile
system.note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Power Axe of the Angels Encarmine Chapter. Whenever the wielder scores Righteous Fury on an opponent, in addition to normal effects a Photon Flash Grenade-like effect occurs.

description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Power Field, Tearing, Unbalanced, Volatile

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Power Axe of the Angels Encarmine Chapter. Whenever the wielder scores Righteous Fury on an opponent, in addition to normal effects a Photon Flash Grenade-like effect occurs.
